SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard

Class PuzzleElement<T>

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.PuzzleElement<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of data held by the PuzzleElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipClue, GridCell, MasyuLine, ShortTruthTableStatement, SkyscrapersClue, StarBattleBorder, TreeTentClue, TreeTentLine
public abstract class PuzzleElement<T> extends Object
PuzzleElement represents a single element in a puzzle grid. It holds data and provides various methods to manage and retrieve its properties, including modifiability, modification status, and validity.

      public boolean isValid()
      Get whether this puzzle element data is a valid change according to the rule applied to the transition that this puzzle element is contained in.
      Returns:
      true if the puzzle element logically follows from the rule, otherwise false.
